revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=DongShanPi |model=Seven |revision=SOM |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=SoM, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female (Type-C) |cpu1_brand=STMicro |cpu1_model=STM32MP157D |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kioxia |fla1_model=THGBMDG5D1LBAIL |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/ PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, USB to High Speed Serial Port Chip;Nanjing Qinheng Micro;CH9102F;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Diode Array;Leiditech;ULC0544P10;;2;,,, 1.5MHz 2A Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SM8082A;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, MIPI DSI, RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=U-Boot;2020.01;stm32mp-r1; |stock_os=Linux;5.4.31;Buildroot; }} {{TagLine|Dongshan Pi Seven}} :[https://dongshanpi.com/DongshanPi-Seven/01-BoardIntroduction/ Product page]
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[STMicro]] STM32MP157DAC :Dual-core ARM (Cortex A-7) @800MHz :+ ARM (Cortex-M4) @209MHz *GPU: Vivante (OpenGL ES2.0) *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gbe LAN ports *USB: 1x USB Type-C (Host), 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: USB Female (Type-C)
==Images== <gallery> File:DongShanPi Seven SOM Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:DongShanPi Seven SOM Bottom.jpeg|Som Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
